import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Button, Card, Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import DemoNavbar from "components/Navbars/DemoNavbar.js"; import SimpleFooter from "components/Footers/SimpleFooter.js"; class Profile extends React.Component { state = { profile: null, }; async componentDidMount() { document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0; document.scrollingElement.scrollTop = 0; this.refs.main.scrollTop = 0; const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")); const userId = user.userId; try { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/profile/${userId}`); this.setState({ profile: response.data }); } catch (error) { console.error("There was an error fetching the profile!", error); } } render() { const { profile } = this.state; if (!profile) { return
